net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: jse.mainDialog.editJSON
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Main JSON Editor function.
arg(0) = params

params = JSON object with the following keys:
'object': JSON Object or Array to edit
'macroLinkText': Call-back macro for the form action

The call-back macro will be provided a JSON object with the following:
'action': The action selected: 'save' or 'cancel'
'object': The JSON object, including any edits
